TitlePage.Title: PAG
TitlePage.Subtitle: Prescribed Automorphism Groups
TitlePage.Author:
Vedran Krcadinac
University of Zagreb, Faculty of Science,
Department of Mathematics
Bijenicka cesta 30, HR-10000 Zagreb, Croatia
vedran.krcadinac@math.hr https://web.math.pmf.unizg.hr/~krcko/homepage.html
TitlePage.Abstract: &PAG; is a &GAP; package for constructing combinatorial objects with prescribed automorphism groups.
